original_text: Meanwhile, Saul was still breathing out murderous threats against the Lord’s disciples. He went to the high priest
korean_text: 사울이 주의 제자들에 대하여 여전히 위협과 살기가 등등하여 대제사장에게 가서

sentences.original_text: Saul was still breathing out murderous threats
sentences.korean_translation: 사울은 여전히 살의 있는 위협을 내뱉고 있었고

sentences.original_text: He went to the high priest
